translations.literal: Thirteenth year, Wu summoned Lu, Wei lords met at Tao Gao.

sentences.zh: 十四年春，吳王北會諸侯於黃池，欲霸中國以全周室。

translations.literal: Fourteenth year spring, Wu king north met feudal lords at Huang Chi, wanted to hegemonize central states to preserve Zhou house.
translations.idiomatic: In the fourteenth year spring, Wu king north met the feudal lords at Huang Chi; wanted to hegemonize the central states to preserve the Zhou house.

sentences.zh: 六月（戊）［丙］子，越王句踐伐吳。

translations.literal: Sixth month Bing Zi, Yue king Gou Jian attacked Wu.
translations.idiomatic: On the Bing Zi day of the sixth month, Yue king Gou Jian attacked Wu.

sentences.zh: 乙酉，越五千人與吳戰。

translations.literal: Yi You, Yue five thousand with Wu battled.
translations.idiomatic: On Yi You, Yue's five thousand battled with Wu.

sentences.zh: 丙戌，虜吳太子友。

translations.literal: Bing Xu, captured Wu crown prince You.
translations.idiomatic: On Bing Xu, captured Wu crown prince You.

sentences.zh: 丁亥，入吳。

translations.literal: Ding Hai, entered Wu.
translations.idiomatic: On Ding Hai, entered Wu.

sentences.zh: 吳人告敗於王夫差，夫差惡其聞也。

translations.literal: Wu people reported defeat to king Fu Chai, Fu Chai hated their hearing it.
translations.idiomatic: Wu people reported the defeat to king Fu Chai; Fu Chai hated their hearing it.

sentences.zh: 或泄其語，吳王怒，斬七人於幕下。

translations.literal: Someone leaked the words, Wu king angered, beheaded seven people under tent.
translations.idiomatic: Someone leaked the words; Wu king angered; beheaded seven people under the tent.

sentences.zh: 七月辛丑，吳王與晉定公爭長。

translations.literal: Seventh month Xin Chou, Wu king with Jin Ding Gong contended seniority.
translations.idiomatic: On the seventh month Xin Chou, Wu king contended seniority with Jin Ding Gong.

sentences.zh: 吳王曰：「於周室我為長。」

translations.literal: Wu king said: 'Regarding Zhou house I am senior.'
translations.idiomatic: Wu king said: 'Regarding the Zhou house, I am senior.'

sentences.zh: 晉定公曰：「於姬姓我為伯。」

translations.literal: Jin Ding Gong said: 'Regarding Ji surname I am elder.'
translations.idiomatic: Jin Ding Gong said: 'Regarding the Ji surname, I am elder.'

sentences.zh: 趙鞅怒，將伐吳，乃長晉定公。

translations.literal: Zhao Yang angered, about to attack Wu, then made Jin Ding Gong senior.
translations.idiomatic: Zhao Yang angered; about to attack Wu; then made Jin Ding Gong senior.

sentences.zh: 吳王已盟，與晉別，欲伐宋。

translations.literal: Wu king already allied, with Jin parted, wanted to attack Song.
translations.idiomatic: Wu king had already allied; parted with Jin; wanted to attack Song.

sentences.zh: 太宰嚭曰：「可勝而不能居也。」

translations.literal: Prime minister Pi said: 'Can conquer but cannot occupy also.'
translations.idiomatic: Prime minister Pi said: 'We can conquer it but cannot occupy it.'

sentences.zh: 乃引兵歸國。

translations.literal: Then led troops returned to state.
translations.idiomatic: Then led troops back to the state.

sentences.zh: 國亡太子，內空，王居外久，士皆罷敝，於是乃使厚幣以與越平。

translations.literal: State lost crown prince, interior empty, king stayed outside long, soldiers all exhausted, therefore then sent thick gifts to make peace with Yue.
translations.idiomatic: The state had lost the crown prince; interior was empty; king had stayed outside long; soldiers were all exhausted; therefore sent thick gifts to make peace with Yue.

translations.literal: Fourteenth year spring, Wu king north assembled feudal lords at Huang Chi, wished hegemonize central states to complete Zhou chamber. Sixth month Bing Zi, Yue king Gou Jian attacked Wu. Yi You, Yue five thousand with Wu battled. Bing Xu, captured Wu crown prince You. Ding Hai, entered Wu. Wu people reported defeat to king Fu Cha, Fu Cha disliked its hearing. Someone leaked the speech, Wu king angered, beheaded seven people under tent. Seventh month Xin Chou, Wu king with Jin Ding Gong contended precedence. Wu king said: 'At Zhou chamber I am elder.' Jin Ding Gong said: 'Among Ji surname I am senior.' Zhao Yang angered, about to attack Wu, then made Jin Ding Gong senior. Wu king already allied, with Jin separated, wished attack Song. Chief steward Pi said: 'Can conquer but cannot reside.' Then led troops returned country. Country lost crown prince, internally empty, king stayed outside long, scholars all tired exhausted, then made rich bribes with Yue peace.

sentences.zh: 十五年，齊田常殺簡公。

translations.literal: Fifteenth year, Qi Tian Chang killed Jian Gong.
translations.idiomatic: In the fifteenth year, Qi Tian Chang killed Jian Gong.

translations.literal: Fifteenth year, Qi Tian Chang killed Jian Gong.

sentences.zh: 十八年，越益彊。

translations.literal: Eighteenth year, Yue moreover strong.
translations.idiomatic: In the eighteenth year, Yue became moreover strong.

sentences.zh: 越王句踐率兵（使）［復］伐敗吳師於笠澤。

translations.literal: Yue king Gou Jian led troops again attacked defeated Wu troops at Li Ze.
translations.idiomatic: Yue king Gou Jian led troops and again attacked; defeated Wu troops at Li Ze.

sentences.zh: 楚滅陳。

translations.literal: Chu extinguished Chen.
translations.idiomatic: Chu extinguished Chen.

translations.literal: Eighteenth year, Yue increasingly strong. Yue king Gou Jian led troops again defeated Wu troops at Li Ze. Chu extinguished Chen.

sentences.zh: 二十年，越王句踐復伐吳。

translations.literal: Twentieth year, Yue king Gou Jian again attacked Wu.
translations.idiomatic: In the twentieth year, Yue king Gou Jian again attacked Wu.

sentences.zh: 二十一年，遂圍吳。

translations.literal: Twenty-first year, then surrounded Wu.
translations.idiomatic: In the twenty-first year, then surrounded Wu.

sentences.zh: 二十三年十一月丁卯，越敗吳。

translations.literal: Twenty-third year eleventh month Ding Mao, Yue defeated Wu.
translations.idiomatic: In the twenty-third year eleventh month on Ding Mao, Yue defeated Wu.

sentences.zh: 越王句踐欲遷吳王夫差於甬東，予百家居之。

translations.literal: Yue king Gou Jian wanted to move Wu king Fu Chai to Yong east, gave one hundred households to dwell there.
translations.idiomatic: Yue king Gou Jian wanted to move Wu king Fu Chai to Yong east; gave one hundred households to dwell there.

sentences.zh: 吳王曰：「孤老矣，不能事君王也。

translations.literal: Wu king said: 'I am orphaned and old, cannot serve lord king also.'
translations.idiomatic: Wu king said: 'I am orphaned and old; cannot serve the lord king.'

sentences.zh: 吾悔不用子胥之言，自令陷此。」

translations.literal: I regret not using Zi Xu words, self made fall into this.'
translations.idiomatic: 'I regret not using Zi Xu's words; self made fall into this.'

sentences.zh: 遂自剄死。

translations.literal: Then self slit throat died.
translations.idiomatic: Then slit his own throat and died.

sentences.zh: 越王滅吳，誅太宰嚭，以為不忠，而歸。

translations.literal: Yue king extinguished Wu, executed prime minister Pi, considered him disloyal, and returned.
translations.idiomatic: Yue king extinguished Wu; executed prime minister Pi for considering him disloyal; and returned.

translations.literal: Twentieth year, Yue king Gou Jian again attacked Wu. Twenty-first year, then surrounded Wu. Twenty-third year eleventh month Ding Mao, Yue defeated Wu. Yue king Gou Jian wished move Wu king Fu Cha to Yong Dong, gave hundred households dwelt. Wu king said: 'I old, cannot serve king. I regret not using Zi Xu's words, self caused fall this.' Then self beheaded died. Yue king extinguished Wu, executed chief steward Pi, considered not loyal, returned.

sentences.zh: 太史公曰：孔子言「太伯可謂至德矣，三以天下讓，民無得而稱焉」。

translations.literal: Grand historian said: Confucius said 'Tai Bo can be called utmost virtue indeed, three times yielded the world, people have no way to praise it.'
translations.idiomatic: The Grand Historian said: Confucius said 'Tai Bo can truly be called a man of utmost virtue; three times he yielded the world; the people have no way to praise him adequately.'

sentences.zh: 余讀春秋古文，乃知中國之虞與荊蠻句吳兄弟也。

translations.literal: I read Spring and Autumn ancient text, then knew central states Yu with Jing barbarian Gou Wu were brothers also.
translations.idiomatic: I read the Spring and Autumn ancient text; then knew that the Yu of the central states and the Gou Wu of the Jing barbarians were brothers.

sentences.zh: 延陵季子之仁心，慕義無窮，見微而知清濁。

translations.literal: Yan Ling Ji Zi benevolence heart, admired righteousness without limit, saw minute and knew clear turbid.
translations.idiomatic: Yan Ling Ji Zi's benevolent heart; admired righteousness without limit; saw the minute and knew the clear and turbid.

sentences.zh: 嗚呼，又何其閎覽博物君子也！

translations.literal: Wu hu, moreover what his vast view broad knowledge gentleman also!
translations.idiomatic: Ah! Moreover what a gentleman of vast vision and broad knowledge he was!

translations.literal: Grand Historian said: Confucius said 'Tai Bo can call utmost virtue, three times let world, people have no way name it'. I read Spring and Autumn ancient text, then knew central states Yu with Jing Man Gou Wu brothers. Yan Ling Ji Zi's benevolent heart, admired righteousness without end, saw minute knew clear turbid. Alas, moreover what vast view broad knowledge gentleman!
